name: Center for Responsible Enterprise And Trade
membership: We are members of or work closely with the following groups: IPO,  Conference Board, Ethisphere, UNIFAB, INTA, International Chamber of Commerce (ICC), ICC- Germany, ICC-Mexico, LES and academic institutions
goal: CREATe.org is a non profit organization founded in 2011 to help companies and supply chain members mitigate the risk of counterfeiting, piracy, trade secret theft and corruption by improving management system processes and practices to protect IP and prevent corruption.
interests: Enterprise, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Engagement on Intellectual Property (IP) Awareness and Management, IP Legislation, IP Counterfeiting and Piracy, Cybersecurity and Anti-Corruption issues.
